question: Which cricket team has clinched the Indian Premier League (IPL) 2020 title?
explanation:
The cricket team “Mumbai Indians” has clinched the title of IPL 2020 tournament. This marks the 5th IPL victory for the team.
The team played against the Delhi Capitals in the final match, where Mumbai Indians won by 5 wickets. The team Mumbai Indians is owned by Reliance Industries through its wholly owned subsidiary IndiaWin Sports.
